product_name: The North Face Fave-Our-Ite Pullover Hoodie - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Combining a great fit with post-workout warmth, the Fav-Our-Ite Pullover Hoodie for women from The North Face is ready for your next cross-training session. Lightweight polyester fleece is soft, comfortable and resists pilling. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. The North Face Fav-Our-Ite Pullover Hoodie features a hidden media-player pocket and an open kangaroo hand pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Combining a great fit with post-workout warmth, the Fav-Our-Ite Pullover Hoodie for women from The North Face is ready for your next cross-training session.
